mapper.insert: merge into pr3basket b using (select #{member_num} as member_num, #{book_isbn} as book_isbn, 1 as basket_qry from dual) mt on (b.book_isbn = mt.book_isbn and b.member_num = mt.member_num) when matched then update set b.basket_qry = b.basket_qry + 1 when not matched then insert(member_num, book_isbn, basket_qry) values(mt.member_num, mt.book_isbn, mt.basket_qry)
mapper.select: select m.member_name, b.book_name, b.book_price, bas.basket_qry, (b.book_price*bas.basket_qry) as counted, bas.book_isbn, b.book_point from pr3basket bas, pr3book b, pr3member m where bas.book_isbn=b.book_isbn and bas.member_num=m.member_num and m.member_num=#{member_num}
